sample.title: ElsieFour
sample.summary: This template shows how the ElsieFour ciphercan be used to encrypt and decrypt text.
sample.description: With this template we illustrate the encryption of a plaintext by means of the ElsieFour cipher. It is a cipher that can be computed by hand. The cipher was developed by Alan Kaminsky.

replacement.value: {\b ElsieFour} (also known as LC4) was developed by Alan Kaminsky. It is a cipher that can be computed by hand. ElsieFour is intended for encrypted communication between humans and therefore encrypts plaintexts consisting only of the English letters A to Z and some other characters.\line \line In this template, you may enter a plaintext, which is then encrypted and afterwards decrypted. The key is a permutation of (1) the alphabet ABC...Z, (2) followed by # and _, which represent 0 and 1, and followed by (3) the remaining digits 34...9.
